price: Ka ce: "Ku yi ɗã'a ga Allah da Manzo." To, amma idan sun jũya bãya, to, lalle ne Allah bã Ya son kãfirai.
arabic: قُلۡ أَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱلرَّسُولَۖ فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul aṭīʿū al-laha wal-rasūla fa-in tawallaw fa-inna al-laha lā yuḥibbu al-kāfirīna
